targets.rawSql: SELECT connState FROM SafeTunnelsCoojaDB.sensorsConnStateSeries WHERE sensorID = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(timestamp,'20s'),
  connState
FROM sensorsConnStateSeries
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND sensorID = 1
ORDER BY timestamp
